Screenwriter: Wuershan, Zhang Jiajia, Ma Luoshan, Tang Que
Rating: PG-13 (Sequences of Stylized Violence|Partial Nudity|Brief Crude Humor|Some Bloody Images)
Synopsis: A group of misfits gets involved with a kitchen cleaver made from five of the greatest swords.
Title: The Butcher, the Chef, and the Swordsman
